mentionedBy.name: Wix
mentionedBy.notes: Major competitor with drag-and-drop builder and free hosting. Weebly was experiencing peak growth around 2015 before its popularity began to wane. Known for being extremely easy to use and beginner-friendly. Later acquired by Square in 2018.

mentionedBy.name: Wix
mentionedBy.notes: Square-owned e-commerce platform with drag-and-drop builder and free hosting. While still a competitor, Weebly's growth had slowed since 2015 and the platform received less frequent updates after Square's 2018 acquisition.

mentionedBy.name: Wix
mentionedBy.notes: Square-owned platform with free selling capability and beginner-friendly interface. However, platform hadn't received regular updates since 2019, making tools and designs outdated compared to Wix and other modern competitors.

mentionedBy.name: Wix
mentionedBy.notes: Square-owned platform considered best for average users wanting better e-commerce functionality and more apps than basic Wix. Allows free selling capability. Mobile app enables site creation on-the-go. However, platform hasn't received regular updates since 2019, making it dated compared to actively developed competitors.
